verb.definition: Estimate, measure, or note the similarity or dissimilarity between.
verb.example: Individual schools compared their facilities with those of others.

verb.definition: Point out the resemblances to; liken to.
verb.example: Her novel was compared to the work of Daniel Defoe.

noun.definition: The act or instance of comparing; a comparison.
noun.example: A comparison of the two options helps in decision making.

usage_examples: We compared the two cars before buying one.
You cannot compare these two situations.
